trans-unit.source: Loads/Sets a specified tray pause icon.

seg-source.mrk: Loads/Sets a specified tray pause icon.

target.mrk: Loads/Sets a specified tray pause icon.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The filename of the icon to be display as pause icon in the tray.

seg-source.mrk: The filename of the icon to be display as pause icon in the tray.

target.mrk: The filename of the icon to be display as pause icon in the tray.

trans-unit.source: [optional] Icon identifier if the file contains multiple icons.

seg-source.mrk: Icon identifier if the file contains multiple icons.

target.mrk: Icon identifier if the file contains multiple icons.

trans-unit.source: To reset the pause icon to the default (red cross), use the function with no parameters TraySetPauseIcon().

seg-source.mrk: To reset the pause icon to the default (red cross), use the function with no parameters TraySetPauseIcon().

target.mrk: To reset the pause icon to the default (red cross), use the function with no parameters TraySetPauseIcon().

trans-unit.source: Passing a positive number will reference the string equivalent icon name.

seg-source.mrk: Passing a positive number will reference the string equivalent icon name.

target.mrk: Passing a positive number will reference the string equivalent icon name.

trans-unit.source: Passing a negative number causes 1-based "index" behaviour. Some Dll can have icon extracted just with negative numbers.

seg-source.mrk: Passing a negative number causes 1-based "index" behaviour.
Some Dll can have icon extracted just with negative numbers.

target.mrk: Passing a negative number causes 1-based "index" behaviour.
Some Dll can have icon extracted just with negative numbers.

trans-unit.source: Set the pause icon. This will flash on and off when the tray menu is selected and the script is paused.

seg-source.mrk: This will flash on and off when the tray menu is selected and the script is paused.

target.mrk: This will flash on and off when the tray menu is selected and the script is paused.
